Catworld

In this platform video game, Dédé the cat has to save the world from evil capitalists. To this aim, Dédé has to move (by pressing the left and right arrows), to jump (up arrow), and to throw love (press spacebar) to convert capitalists into lovely hippies. You can also use your gamepad.

Either Play in Your Own World

  • Draw your level and save it in a png/jpg file with ~ 2000 X 500 pixels (could be more, but do not give a too small image). You can either use a software or take a photo of a handmade picture! Obstacles are in black.
  • Then load or drag and drop your image:

Or Choose Some Predefined Level

Authors

Character design: Karine Morin
Level design: Karine Morin and François Schwarzentruber
Program: François Schwarzentruber
